name: Captain Sabertooth 2: The Curse of Gory Gabriel
name_original: Captain Sabertooth 2: The Curse of Gory Gabriel
description:
Captain Sabertooth 2: The Curse of Gory Gabriel is an arcade game developed by Artplant. It was originally released in 2007. Norsk Spill Distribusjon published the game.
You can play Captain Sabertooth 2: The Curse of Gory Gabriel on PC.
